Translations.Text: Muhammad (PBUH) Allah kay rasool hain aur jo log unn kay sath hain kafiron per sakht hain aapas mein reham dil hain tu enhen dekhay ga kay rukoo aur sajday ker rahey hain Allah Taalaa kay fazal aur raza mandi ki justujoo mein hain inn ka nishan inn kay chehron per sajdon kay asar say hai inn ki yeh hi misal toraat mein hai aur inn ki misal injeel mein hai misil uss kheti kay jiss ney apna ankhwa nikala phir ussay mazboot kiya aur woh mota hogaya phir apnay tanay per seedha khara hogaya aur kisano ko khush kernay laga takay inn ki waja say kafiron ko chiraye inn eman walon aur nek aemaal walon say Allah ney bakhsish ka aur boht baray sawab ka wada kiya hai
Aey eman walay logo! Allah aur uss kay rasool say aagay na barho aur Allah say dartay raha kero. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa sunnay wala, jannay wala hai

Aey eman walo! Apni aawazen nabi ki awaz say uper na kero aur na unn say unchi aawaz say baat kero jesay aapas mein aik doosray say kertay ho, kahin (aisa na ho kay) tumharay aemaal ikaarat jayen aur tumhen khabar bhi na ho

Be-shak jo log Rasool Allah (PBUH) kay huzoor mein apni aawazen past rakhtay hain yehi woh log hain jinn kay dilon ko Allah ney perhezgari kay liye jaanch liya hai. Inn kay liye maghfirat hai aur bara sawab hai
Jo log aap ko hujron kay peechay say pukaray hain inn mein say aksar (bilkul) bey aqal hain
